title: Microsoft Entra Health Monitoring Signals in General Availability (GA)
description: Microsoft Entra health monitoring, available from the Health blade, includes a set of low-latency pre-computed health metrics that can be used to monitor the health of critical user scenarios in your tenant. The first set of health scenarios includes MFA, CA-compliant devices, CA-managed devices, and SAML authentications. This set of monitorable scenarios will grow over time.
